{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=NTV300S |revision= |upc=606449085808 |ean= |asin=B008ABO6EM |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=08/29/2012 |manuf_country= |manuf=Wistron NeWeb |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=media streamer |fcc_id=PY312200197 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT8653EDAG |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand=Hynix |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT5372 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags=HDMI,A/V Out |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} ''NeoTV PRO Streaming Player''
[http://www.netgear.com/home/products/hometheater/media-players/NTV300S.aspx Product page] "48.JP701.0GA" and "2012/07/10" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC internal photos. :'''Wistron NeWeb Corp''' (WNC) is presumed to be the OEM. This device only has one RAM chip in the FCC photos. The same FCC ID is also used for the [[Netgear NTV300SL]] (NeoTV MAX).
